short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control questions and answers on ChatGPT using Firewall inspection

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BusinessGPT is a Security and Governance Firewall for Generative AI. 
 
The core offering includes a unique real-time Firewall that mitigates AI risks by controlling AI usage, such as ChatGPT/Copilot and local AI services.

BusinessGPT also provides a complete end-to-end Private/ On-premise AI solution for highly regulated companies, ensuring zero data exposure.
 
The solution allows users to securely ask questions and responsibly use insights from all company data.
